Couldn't find an exact match, but these come close:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/case-study-no-one-lt/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110106/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/case-study-no-one-lt/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/case-study-no-one-lt/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mendoza-vergara/proteina/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110106/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mendoza-vergara/proteina/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mendoza-vergara/proteina/")
It looks like **[Politica (Black)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110106/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/politica2/)** by Alejandro Paul [Sudtipos, 2004-2013]

I should have put two and two together--Discovery South America, and my favorite South American type foundry.

Guess I'm so enamored with the Sudtipos script fonts, I was blind to their sans fonts.
